channel.title: CVE Feed for BUFFALO INC. -- BBR-4HG
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BUFFALO INC. -- BBR-4HG

item.title: CVE-2017-10897|2024-08-05T17:50:12.489Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- bbr-4hg
item.description: Input validation issue in Buffalo BBR-4HG and and BBR-4MG broadband routers with firmware 1.00 to 1.48 and 2.00 to 2.07 allows an attacker to cause the device to become unresponsive via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-10896|2024-08-05T17:50:12.602Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- bbr-4hg
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Buffalo BBR-4HG and and BBR-4MG broadband routers with firmware 1.00 to 1.48 and 2.00 to 2.07 allows an attacker to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.
